code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 38 YO white male foreman describes Liver. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking he drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 166 cm, Weight 59.9 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:38 year old male with Liver. he has had several such episodes over past 15 months. patient reports that he smokes once or twice daily he drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 167 cm, Weight 61.8 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Hepatitis A Ab IgG, Liver Function Panel.

td.content: s:a 39 YO white m foreman presents with Liver. he is having symptoms 1-3 x day, in spite of treatment. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 60.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 14 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:a 39 yo white M describes recurrent Liver over the past month. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 62.2 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 16 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Prednisolone - 30 mg daily with a taper.
